channel.title: Help with yell command?

item.title: Help with yell command?
item.dc:creator: @Taintisacoder Taintisacoder
item.description:
@Taintisacoder wrote:

I need help with the yell command, i am using Deltas original release, and i am looking for a yell command that when mods yelled it, it would say “[mod]Taint:hey” or something along that lines, same thing for owner and admin. help please?

if (command.startsWith("message") && command.length() > 8 && if playerRights > 2) { String text = command.substring ; yell("[Admin]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt ) + text.substring(1)); } else { if (playerRights > 1) ; String text = command.substring ; yell("[Moderator]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt ) + text.substring(1)); } else {

Read full topic
